name: ohmyfood
description: Mobile-first integration, CSS animation and versioning with Git and GitHub.
presentation: Ohmyfood! is an online meal ordering company. The concept allows users to compose their own menu and reduce their waiting time in restaurants.

name: KASA
description: Configure navigation via React Router, develop interfaces with React components, integrate CSS animations, use Sass for advanced styling, and initialize projects with Create React App.
presentation: Kasa is an accommodation rental company for private individuals. The concept enables users to find an unusual accommodation and book a night's stay.

name: Argent Bank
description: API data integration, API route configuration and Redux state management for optimized web applications.
presentation: Argent Bank is an online bank. The concept allows users to consult their accounts, make transfers and manage their profile.

name: Booki
description: Mastery of responsive interface implementation in HTML and CSS, configuration of front-end development environments, and precise integration of content according to mock-ups.
presentation: Booki is an online accommodation booking company. The concept allows users to book hotel rooms, houses or apartments.
